INSERT INTO maxcar_statistics_l.carstock_month( market_id, tenant_id, report_time, invoice_stock_id, invoice_stock_name, stock_count ) SELECT c.market_id, c.tenant, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), ( CASE WHEN cb.market_price < 5 THEN '0' WHEN 4.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 10 THEN '1' WHEN 9.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 15 THEN '2' WHEN 14.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 20 THEN '3' WHEN 19.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 25 THEN '4' WHEN 24.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 30 THEN '5' WHEN 29.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 35 THEN '6' WHEN 34.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 40 THEN '7' WHEN 39.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 45 THEN '8' WHEN 44.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 50 THEN '9' WHEN 49.9999 < cb.market_price THEN '10' END ) AS invoice_stock_id, ( CASE WHEN cb.market_price < 5 THEN '5万以下' WHEN 4.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 10 THEN '5-10万' WHEN 9.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 15 THEN '10-15万' WHEN 14.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 20 THEN '15-20万' WHEN 19.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 25 THEN '20-25万' WHEN 24.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 30 THEN '25-30万' WHEN 29.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 35 THEN '30-35万' WHEN 34.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 40 THEN '35-40万' WHEN 39.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 45 THEN '40-45万' WHEN 44.9999 < cb.market_price AND cb.market_price < 50 THEN '45-50万' WHEN 49.9999 < cb.market_price THEN '50万以上' END ) AS invoice_stock_name, COUNT(c.tenant) FROM maxcar_stock_l.car c LEFT JOIN maxcar_stock_l.car_base cb ON c.id = cb.id WHERE c.isvalid = 1 AND c.stock_status IN (1,2,3) AND c.car_type = 1 AND c.insert_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),INTERVAL 1 DAY ), INTERVAL - 1 SECOND) GROUP BY c.tenant,invoice_stock_id
